summary:
A National Acquisition Center Contracting Officer who has office space at the Consolidated Mail Outpatient Pharmacy (CMOP) reported that her personal 
identifiable documents which were uploaded into the VA Electronic Contract Management System (eCMS) FAC-C Certification and CLP Tracker were made public 
to VA users other than those who had approved access to view the documents. These documents included her warrant, college transcripts, training certifications 
and high school diploma. The access also allowed for editing of her PII information. It was first reported to her by the Coatesville VA Medical Center. This incident 
was reported to the VA Acquisition Systems Helpdesk. It is unknown at this time exactly what PII was released. It is also unknown if this was an isolated incident 
or widespread. The investigation is ongoing.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
